group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the Affiliated Hospital of Zunyi Medical University institutional review board (IRB). The data were obtained from TCGA (ExternalRef removed). Informed consent has been obtained from all individual participants included in the study was approved by the Institutional review Board.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
